channel.title: Raycast on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Raycast on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Assign issues to Copilot coding agent from Raycast
item.description:
GitHub Copilot coding agent can now be assigned issues directly from Raycast, enabling you to delegate tasks to the agent and later review its work.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Start and track Copilot coding agent tasks from Raycast
item.description:
Raycast, a macOS launcher, now supports interaction with AI agents, including starting and tracking GitHub Copilot coding agent tasks.

  • Source: GitHub
